snippet: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel said the armed forces should “continually” review its prohibition, calling into question whether the ban may eventually be lifted.
abstract: Defense Sec Chuck Hagel says military should continually review its prohibition on transgender people in armed forces, calling into question whether Pentagon's current military ban may eventually be lifted, as it was on gay men and lesbians.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel said the armed forces should “continually” review its prohibition, calling into question whether the ban may eventually be lifted.

headline.main: Hagel ‘Open’ to Reviewing Military’s Ban on Transgender People
headline.print_headline: Hagel ‘Open’ to Reviewing Military’s Transgender Ban

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
